title: Walter Davis (rugby union)
text:
Walter Davis was a <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player who represented <a href="Australia">Australia</a>.
Davis, a <a href="prop%20%28rugby%20union%29">prop</a> and <a href="lock%20%28rugby%20union%29">lock</a>, claimed a three international rugby caps for Australia. His debut game was against Great Britain at Sydney on 24 June 1899, the inaugural rugby Test match played by an <a href="Australia%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">Australian national representative</a> side.
